      • decodeValue

        public int decodeValue(IField field,
                       int type,
                       boolean optional,
                       IValue value)
                throws FastCodecException
        Decode a value
        Parameters:
        field - Used only when FastCodecException is thrown to provide template and field name
        type - value type
        optional - is the field mandatory?
        value - value to decode
        Returns:
        number of bytes of the decoded value
        Throws:
        FastCodecException - This exception is thrown either directly while decoding a value or as wrapper to IO/conversion exceptions. It indicates always the field/template name

      • encodeInteger

        public int encodeInteger(IField field,
                         boolean signed,
                         boolean optional,
                         IValue value,
                         BytesSegment dest,
                         int start)
                  throws FastCodecException,
                         ConversionException
        Encode the given value into the given byte array starting at the given index.
        Parameters:
        field - Used only when FastCodecException is thrown to provide template and field name
        signed - True if this is treated as a signed integer.
        optional - True if this value is from an optional field.
        value - Value to be encoded.
        dest - Destination for encoded bytes.
        start - Start index in byte array for encoded bytes.
        Returns:
        Number of bytes encoded.
        Throws:
        FastCodecException - If the value could not be encoded
        ConversionException - If value cannot be converted.

      • encodeString

        public int encodeString(IField field,
                        boolean optional,
                        IValue value,
                        BytesSegment dest,
                        int start)
                 throws FastCodecException,
                        ConversionException
        Throws:
        FastCodecException

      • encodeValue

        public int encodeValue(IField field,
                       int type,
                       boolean optional,
                       IValue value,
                       BytesSegment dest,
                       int start)
                throws FastCodecException
        Encode a value
        Parameters:
        field - Used only when FastCodecException is thrown to provide template and field name
        type - value type
        optional - is the field mandatory?
        value - value to decode
        dest - Destination bytes segement
        start - Start in destination bytes segement
        Returns:
        number of bytes of the encoded value
        Throws:
        FastCodecException - This exception is thrown either directly while encoding a value or as wrapper to IO/conversion exceptions. It indicates always the field/template name
